title: User Story: Suicide
content:
**Option 1 (Seeking Help):**

> Been feeling so low lately. Just existing is exhausting. Talking to someone feels impossible, but I know I need help. Where do I even start?

**Option 2 (Sharing Experience):**

> I remember that dark place. It DOES get better. Hold on. Reach out. You're not alone in this fight.

**Option 3 (Raising Awareness):**

> Check in on your friends, even the seemingly happy ones. You never know what someone's going through. A little kindness can go a long way.
reason: Option 1 expresses feelings of exhaustion and acknowledges a need for help, suggesting potential for escalation if support isn't received. Options 2 and 3 are supportive and preventative, but the initial statement raises concern.
